explanation: [0-0] In a peaceful forest, sunlight streams through the leaves, and a lovely Masha stands in front of a puppet stage, ready to begin a wonderful puppet show.

[0-3] Then Masha opens the red curtain on the puppet stage, revealing an empty stage. A pair of cute teddy bear puppets appears on stage, one wearing a crown and the other a pink bow. Timestamp: 00:00:02

[0-3] Then Masha opens the red curtain on the puppet stage, revealing an empty stage. A pair of cute teddy bear puppets appears on stage, one wearing a crown and the other a pink bow. Timestamp: 00:00:02

[0-3] Then Masha opens the red curtain on the puppet stage, revealing an empty stage. A pair of cute teddy bear puppets appears on stage, one wearing a crown and the other a pink bow. Timestamp: 00:00:02

[3-13] Then a green frog sits on a stone by the river, looking frustrated. Masha peeks out from behind the puppet stage and spots the frog on the stone. Suddenly, thunder rumbles in the sky, startling the teddy bear couple. Masha then grabs the frog, who is startled and opens its mouth in surprise. The frog then kisses the teddy bear puppet, which transforms into another green frog and dances happily. The teddy bear couple in the back watches this scene warmly.

[13-17] Finally, more frogs emerge from the water and dance happily together. The teddy bear couple claps along to the rhythm of the music, their faces filled with happy smiles. Then the boat slowly sails into the distance, and the teddy bear couple waves goodbye.
